about_the_game:
An adult visual novel series with a beautiful red-haired futanari as a protagonist.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Kira, a confident futanari with fiery red hair and an alluring presence.
She starts her day by admiring herself in the mirror, feeling grateful for her distinctive beauty and assets.
Determined to focus on something other than her desires, Kira decides to visit a nearby boutique.
As she browses the racks, she catches the eye of a cute sales assistant, who is eager to help her try on a stunning black lingerie set that has just arrived in the store.
However, things take a wild turn when Kira’s secret is revealed, adding an element of excitement and passion to her shopping experience.

FEATURES

- HD renders
- Image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
All characters depicted are 18 years old and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains straight sex scenes.
Sexual scenes involving transgender characters.

name: Futanari Sex Adventures - Episode 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
